history.proof: intros. intros y Hnot. sfirstorder unfold: closed, locally.

exceptions.tactic: intros T D E HD HE x H.
intros T' D E HD HE x H.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : UniformSpace D, E : T -> Prop H : closed D H0 : closed E y : T Hnot : ~ locally y (fun x : T => ~ (D x /\\ E x)) Unable to unify "closed D" with "D y /\\ E y".

original: intros T D E HD HE x H. unfold closed in HD, HE. intros y Hnot. apply H. split. - apply HD. intros z Hloc. apply Hnot. intros Hnoty. apply Hloc. apply HE. apply Hnoty.
